title: First Look: The Moots Express Flat Bar Gravel eBike Blurs Category Lines
content:
The Moots Flat Bar Express willfully abandons the notion of categorization. Is it a gravel bike? Is it a hardtail mountain bike? "For god's sake guys, stop trying to squash me into a box, it's not fair!", exclaims the outraged Express.

Read the full article at First Look: The Moots Express Flat Bar Gravel eBike Blurs Category Lines on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
